titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5461) to require the Secretary of the Treasury to submit a report to the appropriate congressional committees on the estimated total assets under direct or indirect control by certain senior Iranian leaders and other figures, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5461) to require the Secretary of the Treasury to submit a report to the appropriate congressional committees on the estimated total assets under direct or indirect control by certain senior Iranian leaders and other figures, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-778, by Mr. Woodall.
The resolution makes in order only those amendments printed in the report.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 148.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 876.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 876, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 242 - 181 (Roll no. 526).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 174 (Roll no. 527).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 5461 (Iranian Leadership Asset Transparency Act).
